name: Truck Hill Driving Simulator
description:
Drive offroad cargo truck to explore hilly environment and test your mountain driving skills. Driving on hills, mountains and steep paths is a real driving challenge in Truck Hill Driving Simulator

Features:
- Stunning HD graphics
- Realistic truck control
- Select control between steering, arrows and accelerometer
- Amazing sound effects
- Multiple camera view and angles
- Dangerous road
- Truck optimization
